Since the rank of [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] plus its nullity must equal 6, the rank is at most 5. We also know that [mathjaxinline]w[/mathjaxinline] is a non-zero vector in the image of [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline]. Hence the image of [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] is a non-zero subspace and has dimension at least 1. Therefore the rank of [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] is at least 1.
